snippet: Investors appeared to be adjusting for coming negotiations over the so-called fiscal cliff, offsetting a batch of positive economic news.
abstract: Stocks fall as investors remain concerned about Washington's ability to find a solution for the fiscal cliff in coming weeks and about the continuing debt crisis in Europe.
lead_paragraph: Investors appeared to be adjusting for coming negotiations over the so-called fiscal cliff, offsetting a batch of positive economic news.

headline.main: Worries About Fiscal Cliff Still Weigh on Investors
headline.print_headline: Worries About Fiscal Cliff Still Weigh on Investors
